name: Untitled Deck Building Tycoon Game
description:
Untitled Deck Building Tycoon Game.

This weird little mashup of a very basic deck building card game and a idle tycoon style game was really fun to work on, and we're really happy with how it came out.

Add cards into your hand that each turn generate tokens worth different values. There are currently two types of card;

  • Mine Cards: generate a type of token each turn
  • Factory Cards: converts one type of token from your pool into another more valuable one.

There are some bugs, some of which we know about.

We are really interested to hear what people think of this one, please comment with any feedback!

Dev time: 5:30 (LarsIsGaming 3:30, Wobbling: 2:00)
